test_questions.question: What was BMO's adjusted earnings per share for Q2 2025?
test_questions.answer: BMO reported adjusted earnings per share of $2.62 for Q2 2025.
test_questions.quote: In the quarter, adjusted net income and earnings per share were $2.62, respectively, with PPPT growth of 12%
test_questions.speaker: Darryl White (CEO)

test_questions.question: Tell me about CIBC's performance in the second quarter of fiscal year 2025
test_questions.answer: CIBC reported strong Q2 2025 performance with adjusted EPS of $2.05, net income of $2 billion, ROE of 13.9%, and 19% pre-provision pretax earnings growth. The bank achieved positive operating leverage for the 5th consecutive quarter at 4.3%.

test_questions.question: What synergies did National Bank realize from the CWB acquisition in 2025 Q2?
test_questions.answer: National Bank realized $27 million in cost and funding synergies from the CWB acquisition in Q2 2025, and is targeting $270 million in total synergies by the end of fiscal 2027.

test_questions.question: RBC FY2025 Q2 capital ratio?
test_questions.answer: RBC's Common Equity Tier 1 (CET1) ratio was 13.2% in Q2 FY2025.

test_questions.question: How much did Scotiabank increase its dividend in the April 2025 quarter?
test_questions.answer: Scotiabank increased its quarterly dividend by $0.04 to $1.10 per share in Q2 2025 (quarter ended April 30, 2025).

test_questions.question: TD Bank Q2/25 restructuring charges and expected savings?
test_questions.answer: TD Bank expects restructuring charges of $600-700 million to achieve annual run-rate savings of $550-650 million from its restructuring program announced in Q2 2025.

test_questions.question: What was Bank of Montreal's revenue growth year-to-date in fiscal 2025?
test_questions.answer: Bank of Montreal (BMO) reported 13% year-to-date revenue growth in fiscal 2025.

test_questions.question: How many new retail primary clients did Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce add in 2Q25?
test_questions.answer: CIBC added 392,000 new retail primary clients in Q2 2025.

test_questions.question: National Bank's Financial Markets earnings second quarter twenty twenty-five
test_questions.answer: National Bank's Financial Markets segment reported net income of over $500 million in Q2 2025, benefiting from market volatility.

test_questions.question: Royal Bank performing reserves build Q2 FY25
test_questions.answer: Royal Bank (RBC) built $568 million in performing reserves in Q2 FY2025 to prepare for economic uncertainty.

test_questions.question: BNS Scene+ loyalty program metrics in 2025 second quarter?
test_questions.answer: Bank of Nova Scotia (Scotiabank) reported that Scene+ has 15 million members, with 26% holding a payment product, as of Q2 2025.

test_questions.question: Toronto-Dominion AML spending fiscal 2025
test_questions.answer: TD Bank is spending approximately $500 million annually on AML remediation efforts and is on track with implementation as of Q2 2025.

test_questions.question: BMO Q2-25 US net interest margin expansion
test_questions.answer: BMO's US Personal & Commercial Banking (USP&C) segment achieved net interest margin expansion of 5 basis points in Q2 2025.

test_questions.question: CIBC U.S. Capital Markets revenue growth year-over-year Q2/2025
test_questions.answer: CIBC's U.S. region Capital Markets revenue increased 37% year-over-year in Q2 2025.

test_questions.question: What is NBC's target ROE for fiscal year 2025?
test_questions.answer: National Bank reported an ROE of 15.6% in Q2 2025, the highest among the Canadian banks for that quarter.

test_questions.question: RBC wealth management AUA growth Canada vs US Q2 2025
test_questions.answer: RBC's Wealth Management reported Assets Under Administration (AUA) growth of 11% in Canada and 9% in the US in Q2 2025.

test_questions.question: Scotia's international banking ROE and productivity ratio 2Q/25
test_questions.answer: Scotiabank's International Banking division showed improved performance with a productivity ratio of 51% in Q2 2025, contributing to overall ROE improvement.

test_questions.question: TD wholesale banking revenue record Q2 twenty-twenty-five
test_questions.answer: TD's Wholesale Banking achieved record revenue of $2.1 billion in Q2 2025.

test_questions.question: Bank of Montreal VIP Porter loyalty cards added Q2/FY25
test_questions.answer: BMO added over 10,000 new VIP Porter loyalty cards in Q2 FY2025.

test_questions.question: CIBC's use of AI in commercial banking operations second quarter 2025
test_questions.answer: CIBC reported that 70% of commercial emails are now processed by AI as of Q2 2025, demonstrating significant digital transformation progress.

test_questions.question: Compare BMO and TD's CET1 ratios for Q2 2025
test_questions.answer: In Q2 2025, TD had a higher CET1 ratio at 14.9% compared to BMO's 13.5%, with TD maintaining one of the strongest capital positions among Canadian banks.

test_questions.question: Which Canadian banks announced dividend increases in fiscal Q2 2025 and by how much?
test_questions.answer: In Q2 2025, several banks announced dividend increases: BMO increased by $0.04 (5% increase), RBC by $0.06 (4% increase), and Scotiabank by $0.04 to $1.10 per share.

test_questions.question: Compare CIBC and National Bank ROE second quarter twenty-twenty-five
test_questions.answer: National Bank achieved a higher ROE of 15.6% compared to CIBC's 13.9% in Q2 2025, with NBC reporting the highest ROE among Canadian banks that quarter.

test_questions.question: How are RBC and Scotiabank approaching share buybacks in Q2/25?
test_questions.answer: In Q2 2025, Scotiabank announced a new 20 million share buyback program, while RBC did not specify new buyback activity but maintained strong capital ratios. TD was more aggressive with 30 million shares ($2.5B) in buybacks.

test_questions.question: BMO vs Scotia restructuring savings targets FY2025
test_questions.answer: Scotiabank committed to $800 million in medium-term restructuring savings, while BMO focused on balance sheet optimization without specifying a restructuring program. TD announced $550-650 million in annual savings from restructuring.

test_questions.question: Which banks are building reserves for trade policy uncertainty in 2025 Q2?
test_questions.answer: All six major Canadian banks built reserves for trade policy uncertainty in Q2 2025: BMO added $850M over 3 quarters, RBC built $568M, Scotiabank $346M, TD $395M, NBC $230M for CWB, and CIBC also built reserves for trade uncertainty.

test_questions.question: Compare TD and National Bank's acquisition integration progress Q2 fiscal 2025
test_questions.answer: In Q2 2025, National Bank was integrating CWB with $27M in synergies realized and targeting $270M by fiscal 2027. TD was focused on AML remediation rather than acquisitions, while RBC was completing HSBC Canada integration with cost synergies largely complete by Q3.

test_questions.question: CIBC vs RBC vs NBC earnings per share second quarter 2025
test_questions.answer: In Q2 2025, RBC had the highest EPS at $3.12 (adjusted), followed by NBC at $2.85, and CIBC at $2.05 (adjusted).

test_questions.question: How do BMO's and TD's US operations compare in Q2/FY25?
test_questions.answer: In Q2 2025, BMO's US operations showed NIM expansion of 5 basis points and targeted 12% ROE for USB&C. TD's US operations had NIM of 3.04% (up 18 bps QoQ) but were undergoing balance sheet restructuring and asset reduction as part of strategic review.

test_questions.question: Which Canadian banks highlighted AI initiatives in their 2025 Q2 earnings and what were the key achievements?
test_questions.answer: Multiple banks highlighted AI initiatives in Q2 2025: TD has 800+ AI patent filings (top 10 globally), CIBC processes 70% of commercial emails with AI, and NBC emphasized AI and data initiatives across businesses. All banks are investing heavily in digital transformation and AI capabilities.
